attributes.action: Free travel for full time students, in university for example.
attributes.additional_details: Just in case you didn't know there are people/businesses that are promoting deals for students who want to travel. Travelling to university is important and we need to make it free as we are already paying a unreasonable amount for our education. This will be a burden off our shoulders and we will thank the government for consideration and approving it. The reason why I say for full time students, is because these students don't usually have time to work and so can't fund their travel.
attributes.background: I am a university student, we already have expenses like clothes, food, books, laptops, phone bills and etc. We don't have a maintenance grant anymore it's a loan, that we are using to fund these things. Thus we shouldn't worry about travel expenses too. Thousands of students travel everyday.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. The Government isn't directly responsible for the costs of bus and train travel. You could start a petition calling on the Government to provide funding for a free travel card for students.
